duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the management team in creating the best customer experience and delivering desired results.
Execute assigned store operations and maintain a visually appealing store.
Create a positive environment that develops and engages managers, associates, and customers.
Prior supervisory experience in similar volume, apparel business (preferred).
Proven track record of exceeding sales and statistical expectations.
Flexible availability, including evenings and weekends.
Occasional travel to other store locations may be required.

education_certification.credential: Prior supervisory experience in similar volume, apparel business (preferred).
